text: I chto uderzhivayet vas raskhodovat' svoye dobro Na promysle Allakha? Yemu Yedinomu prinadlezhit naslediye zemli i neba. I neravny pered Allakhom budut te, Kto shchedrost'yu daril do vremeni pobedy I v chas srazhen'ya lichno voyeval, - Oni vozvysyatsya nad temi, Kto, ne srazhayas', shchedrost' proyavlyal lish' posle. Im vsem obeshchana nagrada ot Allakha, I vedayet o vsekh deyan'yakh vashikh On
